title: Leading order effective operators in quantum gravity
summary: We explore the nature of higher dimensional operators generated by quantum gravity. Calculating the tree-level and one-loop effective operators generated by graviton exchange between fields of the standard model and those of a hidden sector, we show that the leading order operators generated by quantum gravity are non-local dimension 6 operators. Dimension 5 operators are not generated by perturbative (weak field) effects, although they might be generated by strong field effects such as Planck-scale fluctuations in spacetime. We investigate the consequences of our findings for models of ultralight scalar dark matter.

AI.method: 通过计算引力子介从而使标准模型和隐藏-sector场之间产生的树级和一级有效算子，证明了该方法的有效性。
AI.result: 发现量子引力主导产生非局部六维算子，而五维算子主要在强场效应下生成。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果揭示了量子引力在暗物质模型中的潜在影响，特别是在 ultralight 标量暗物质模型中。
